name: MightyKnight 2
description:
MightyKnight 2 is a whole new type of fighting game! Save the world against waves of enemies, using different weapons and special attacks. Unique heroes will help you on your quest, each with his own abilities - surviving the apocalypse will take all your shooting and tactical skills!

* Nonstop Action
Over 30 levels to beat, including campaign levels and challenge levels; The "endless" mode you can keep playing forever!

* Endless upgrades
Upgrade your heroes, skills and special attacks.

* Download and play!
